Accueil Se connecter Se déconnecter
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthService} from "../../services/auth.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-navigation', templateUrl: './navigation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navigation.component.scss'] }) export class NavigationComponent { constructor(public authService : AuthService) { } onDisconnect() : void { this.authService.disconnect(); } }
